Headline: No Brown Line trains between Belmont and the Loop
ShortDescription: Brown Line service continues to be temporarily suspended between Belmont and the Loop due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service continues to be temporarily suspended between Belmont and the Loop due to a track condition.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kimball and Belmont at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Belmont and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

Transferring to the Red Line from Belmont Station for further service to the Loop.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
